title: One More Project for David Geffen: Building His Legacy
description: The entertainment mogul has given $1.2 billion to institutions around the nation, including the New York Philharmonic’s transformed Lincoln Center home.
dc:creator: Adam Nagourney
category: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts
media:credit: Nina Westervelt for The New York Times
media:description: When David Geffen finally made it to the rebuilt David Geffen Hall, he sat with Katherine G. Farley, the chair of Lincoln Center’s board.
